directions: Stir tomato juice, vodka, serrano chile peppers, red wine vinegar, olive brine, red pepper, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon black pepper, sriracha sauce, garlic, lemon zest, celery salt, and kosher salt together in a pitcher. Cover the pitcher and refrigerate until chilled, 2 to 4 hours.
Divide ice between 8 Collins glasses. Pour vodka mixture over ice and garnish each with celery rib, asparagus spear, green olive, and black pepper.
ingredients: 2 serrano chile peppers, seeded and minced
1 pickled red pepper (such as Peppadew®), minced
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Sriracha Bloody Mary
